name: reptilian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology
  specialized belonging to or like a reptile: reptilian skin/eyes
disapproving used to describe an unpleasantly strange and unfriendly person or type of behaviour: He turned a cold, reptilian gaze on me.
